div.p: We thank Jacqueline DeFaveri, for discussions and useful comments on earlier versions of this manuscript. Our research was supported by grants from Maj and Tor Nessling Foundation (JM), Finnish Cultural Foundation (PM), Academy of Finland (grants #: 129662, 134728, and 218343 to JM and grant # 316294 to PM), Helsinki Institute of Life Science (HiLife; JM), and Walter and Andr√©e de Nottbeck foundation (HJ). We also thank Rauno Hokki (LUKE) for help in sorting otolith samples and BONUS INSPIRE project for providing funding for the organization, sorting, and shipping of the otolith samples.
